name: Castlegate Capital
overview:
At CastleGate Capital Advisors, we have created something different. Our unique approach differs from traditional advisors who only execute transactions, and it differs from consulting firms that prepare elaborate reports and then send you on your way. We have seasoned professionals with a hands on method of ensuring your success.

Companies facing transformational events need an experienced partner who helps navigate the road to successful outcomes. We take an unbiased, comprehensive and long-term view of your business, working with you every step of the way. We combine the strategic thinking of a debt and equity investor with the special situation experience of a turnaround manager. We bring operational experience to develop creative solutions for complex situations, maximizing value for all stakeholders.

Our solutions are achievable and we are willing to participate in the implementation risk. We have a network of turnaround capital providers, as well as our own affiliated investor group, and we can provide the liquidity necessary to facilitate a transitional event in select situations.
